review: Dr.Sharadha is an excellent and extremely sweet doctor. I met her regarding my period issues just a week before we shifted permanently to Pune. hence I met her in a very tensed and panicked mind. but the moment I met her and told her my issues she listened to each and every thing calmly. she made me relaxed immediately. I followed her medicines and was in touch with her from Pune too. everytime I msgd her she would response immediately!! i have decided that even though m in Pune I will consult her in Practo online regarding my issues. each and every staff was friendly and co operative too. Clinic was neatly maintained. highly recommended. Thank you Dr.Sharadha.‚ô•Ô∏è
reply_text: Thank u for your kind words. Happy that u liked our service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I want to take a moment to express my sincere gratitude to Dr. Saratha Mam for the exceptional care and support she provided during my recent visit. Her expertise, compassion, and professionalism truly made a difference in my experience.

From my initial consultation to the follow-up appointments, Dr. Saratha Mam displayed a remarkable level of ********* *** attentiveness. She took the time to listen to my concerns and thoroughly addressed each of them with a reassuring demeanor, making me feel valued and empowered as a patient.

I was particularly impressed by Dr. Saratha Mam's ability to explain complex medical information in a clear and understandable manner, which significantly eased any anxieties I had. Her genuine concern for my well-being was evident throughout the entire process, and it was truly comforting to be under her care.

Not only did Dr. Saratha Mam demonstrate her expertise in gynecology, but she also fostered a warm and supportive environment that encouraged open communication. I felt respected and understood, and I wholeheartedly appreciate her dedication to ensuring the best possible outcome for her patients.

In conclusion, I am grateful to have been under the care of Dr. Saratha Mam and I believe her unwavering commitment to excellence sets a standard for healthcare professionals everywhere. I will not hesitate to recommend her to family and friends, and I am confident that anyone under her care will experience the same exceptional level of treatment that I did.

Thank you, Dr. Saratha Mam, for your outstanding service and for upholding the highest standards of medical care.

S.Maheswari
reply_text: Thank u so much. Really happy  to heat that u r satisfied with our services.

review:
My name is T. Balakrishnan.Ur Chidambaram.I met Mrs. DR Saradha on 01-04-2014 for my wife's health.

There are many doctors in the world. According to me, a doctor is a messenger of God. What a doctor needs is his kind look, kind words, smiling face, whatever the problem is, we are there. In the modern medical world, everything can be fixed by reassuring the patient like a relative.

I saw all these in Sister Mrs. Dr. Saratha. May Almighty God grant her many years of excellent service in this admirable medical field and lead a disease-free life with great fame. Thank you Doctor!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We were looking for an obstetrician & Gynecologist  near KK nagar and found Dr. Sharadha mam based on Google reviews. 
Hands down she is the best doctor we have come across. 

SRS Clinic in KK nagar was very hygienic and we never waited more than 20mins during our visit. 
She was very calm, welcoming and guided us through out the delivery. She will recommend normal delivery only and prepare our mind unless there is a situation for C section. 

Doctor was very kind, polite and always supportive and answered all our questions. My pregnancy journey went very smooth from day 1 only because of Sharadha mam. She was always positive that helped me to keep my mind calm and happy. With God's grace and help of Sharadha mam we delivered a beautiful baby girl üëº. 

I would definitely recommend Sharadha mam for happy and safe pregnancy.
reply_text: Thank u for your kind words.

I especially loved how Dr.Sharadha's very understanding and listened to all my concerns and really took her time to explain my conditions with me as well as my treatment options. She takes time with the patient to help them with their health issues and She's really lovely to speak with. Had a great visit and the doctor‚Äôs demeanor has really put me at ease so I am so glad I chose Dr.Sharadha as my Gyno and would highly recommend to any of my friends and family.

review: My husband's friend suggested Dr.Sharadha mam for a pregnancy consultation. We have visited other Gynecologists as well but we are not comfortable as we have with Sharadha mam. *** ** *** **** ************ *** such a humble Doctor we have ever met. She listens to our problems and answers all our queries very patiently. From initial pregnancy confirmation till delivery she was very supportive and guided us very well. my pregnancy journey was very smooth and happy only because of her. She won't recommend unnecessary clinical visits or scans.  We are very thankful to Sharadha mam and special thanks to Sneha mam. She is very friendly and cool person. She gave a lot of labour advice and suggested pregnancy exercises.The clinic atmosphere is also very good and clean. I will highly recommend SRS clinic and Dr.Sharadha mam for pregnancy consultation.

Thank you so much doctor.
reply_text: Thank u for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Back in 2021, when I visited Dr. Sharadha, we had already visited 2-3 doctors to get rid of my irregular periods problem and thyroid problem which wasn't helping us get pregnant! She took the time to understand and go through the history and suggested a few tests with which she determined the underlying cause was anovulation. She let the cycles go naturally for the first 2-3 months and then prescribed what can help in ovulation. With that, we were pregnant by the end of 2021 naturally but due to certain reasons, there was a miscarriage. After a relaxation period both physically and mentally, she helped us try again and I'm writing this when I'm 2 months pregnant, and hoping I'll thrive by the remaining pregnancy phase. She has been sweet, very supportive, available on WhatsApp to answer our queries. There's absolutely nothing negative that neither my husband nor I have for we went back to her post a mishap too. Someone you can trust and follow.

review: I had consulted Dr.Sharadha SO for my pregnancy checkup, labor & delivery. Really a great & well experienced gynaecologist handling patients with care. Since this was my first delivery  I had lots of fear on my labor & pain. Her friendly approach,caring and kind hearted behavior took me to a fearless delivery. She heard  all my doubts & queries and gave a clear advice throughout all my pregnancy checkups and visits. Mostly she will try for a normal delivery and she will not unnecessarily put in to Cesarean section. Her treatment & advice took me to a delivery of my healthy baby. Her guidance on post maternity care, breast feeding & advice on contraceptives was good & satisfied. We are happy & satisfied with her consultation & treatment through out my pregnancy & delivery. I thanked god for showing such a great & kind hearted gynaecologist. Thank you.
